channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: With US vehicle prices averaging near $50K, General Motors sees 2nd-quarter profits rise 15%
item.description: U.S. customers who bought a new General Motors vehicle last quarter paid an average of just under $49,900, a price that helped push the company’s net income 15% above a year ago.

item.title: Harris to visit battleground Wisconsin in first rally as Democrats coalesce around her for president
item.description: Vice President Kamala Harris is making her first visit to a battleground state after locking up enough support from Democratic delegates to win her party’s nomination to challenge former President Donald Trump, two days after President Joe Biden dropped his reelection bid.

item.title: Stock market today: World shares are mixed, Chinese indexes sink, after Wall St snaps losing streak
item.description: World shares are mixed and Chinese shares saw their worst day in six months as investors showed scant enthusiasm for Beijing’s latest policy moves.
